title: Understanding Multimodal Image Restoration and Fusion Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of visualization materials and simple practical tools optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles of multimodal image restoration and the limitations of traditional approaches
Understand the operation of deep learning-based image restoration/fusion models and apply them to practical cases
Interpret image processing results using mobile devices in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
